Text: you know this has got to be true I usually dont forward these but this one is particularly frightening to me Dont go to the bathroom on October th CIA intelligence reports that a major plot is planned for that day Anyone who takes a poop on the th will be bitten on the ass by an alligator Reports indicate that organized groups of alligators are planning to rise up into unsuspecting Americans toilet bowls and bite them when they are doing their dirty business I usually dont send emails like this but I got this information from a reliable source It came from a friend of a friend whose cousin is dating this girl whose brother knows this guy whose wife knows this lady whose husband buys hotdogs from this guy who knows a shoeshine guy who shines the shoes of a mailroom worker who has a friend whos drug dealer sells drugs to another mailroom worker who works in the CIA building He apparently overheard two guys talking in the bathroom about alligators and came to the conclusion that we are going to be attacked So it must be true
